description:
After being seriously injured by the Nephilim, Hibiki is unable to control her Symphogear.  She flies into a rage, destroying the Nephilim and ripping out its heart.  During the post-fight medical exam, it`s discovered that if she continues to use her gear, she`ll die.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Miracle Is a Cruel Thing
Kiseki - Sore wa Zankoku na Kiseki
奇跡--それは残酷な軌跡
